column3:
大食堂の復活に欠かせない設備の修復が
完了したのを確認する
column4:
Confirm that the repair of the equipment
for the dining hall has been completed.

column3: ピレモスに食糧を―《甘口》
column4: "Sweet" Food for Piremoth

column3:
食糧不足に陥ったピレモスを支援する
ために、食糧を背負ったキャリーと
共にティネス砦を出発する
column4:
To support the famine-stricken Piremoth,
depart from Fort Thines, carrying provisions
with Carrie.

column4: Hungry Goblin

column3:
ピレモスの食料危機を聞きつけた
キャリーを連れて、村まで向かう
column4:
After learning about the food crisis in Piremoth, 
head to the village with Carrie.

while gathering food, head to the village
together with Carrie.
